question.title: How to fix the "update(liquibase.Contexts) in liquibase.Liquibase has been deprecated"?
question.body:
The following function compiles:

    public void deploy(String ldap, String masterChangeLog) throws Exception{
        Database database = getDatabase(ldap);
        Liquibase liquibase = new Liquibase(masterChangeLog, new ClassLoaderResourceAccessor(), database);
        liquibase.update(new Contexts());
    }

but linter generates a deprecation-warning: update(liquibase.Contexts) in liquibase.Liquibase has been deprecated.

The documentation states, one is supposed to use CommandScope, but there are no examples.

Could someone, please, provide one (or two)?
